duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with Leave Administration, Onboarding, Offboarding, Recruitment, and general administrative support for the Human Resources team.
Serve as a point of contact for employees' HR inquiries and resolve routine matters, forwarding complex issues to HR team members.
Utilize Microsoft Office (Word, PowerPoint, and Excel) for administrative tasks related to HR functions.
Demonstrate proficiency in leave management, HR metrics, and other administrative HR support functions.
Possess basic understanding of Human Resources practices and communicate effectively in both written and oral forms.
Preferred experience in database management and HRIS.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Human Resource Management, Business Management, or related area of study preferred; 1-3 plus years work experience in related field
